title: Alpha Client
body:
HEY RIOT AND OCE COMMUNITY!

So I got alpha (soz those who didn't) but I'm just gonna ask a phew things:

1. When will custom be available?
2. When will 'Training' be available?
3. When the client updates, what will happen (since the lolpatcher is skipped entirely)?
4. Just for the sake of it, when will open beta close? (I'm new to this, so if this question makes you cringe, I'm sorry xD)

Again thanks for the Alpha Client!!!

replies.body: Training is a new kind of gamemode which is for season 7 and i THINK pbe has it, but it wiill definitely be out in the preseason

The Alpha is over in like a week and will turn into an Open Beta.

Over the next month they will be adding every feature possible since, I believe this preseason will only be 4-6 weeks so the client will need to be fully functional before Season 7 starts.

EDIT: ik the alpha is new and is still a work in progress, but if you can answer the first 2 questions that'd be very nice
 {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
